text: Cahida hai ki samaratha vala apani samaratha de anusara kharaca kare ate jisa di amadana ghata hove usa nu cahida hai ki alaha ne jinham usa nu pradana kita hai. Uha usa vicom kharaca karana. Alaha kise te bojha nahim pa'unda, para usa mutabika jinham usanu bakhasi'a hai. Alaha musibata tom ba'ada jaladi hi saukha haida kara devega hai
